A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Just like 'The Force Awakens'\, 'The Last Jedi\" is a visual feast! Filled with amazing effects\, battles and creatures (aliens). I found it somewhat predictable\, but it just didn't matter. The Last Jedi was a fantastic instalment\, and just leaves you ready for more! Bring on part 9. May the force be with you.
